channel.title: Server Run.Bat
channel.description:
Error: Could not find or load main class server.server Press any key to continue . . .
Here is the Run.bat Code: @echo off title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/netty.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
Have At it guys I've tried almost everything possible as far as my knowledge extends. Yes I considered an IDE and I have been using one but I would much rather a fix so if you would be as kind as to help me. Thank you.

item.title: Server Run.Bat

item.description:

Your main class Server in package server isn’t found - make sure the right package is being addressed.

item.title: Server Run.Bat
item.dc:creator: @Runecessor Runecessor
item.description:
@Runecessor wrote:

Error: Could not find or load main class server.server
Press any key to continue . . .

Here is the Run.bat Code:
@echo off
title Server
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/netty.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Have At it guys I’ve tried almost everything possible as far as my knowledge extends. Yes I considered an IDE and I have been using one but I would much rather a fix so if you would be as kind as to help me. Thank you.

Read full topic
